description: The goal of the course is to acquire the knowledge, skills, and understandings necessary to develop, implement and assess a K-5 general music program. The course emphasizes current approaches such as those of Orff, Dalcroze and Kodaly as well as intercultural and interdisciplinary learning. Required 10-hour field experience component. Offered annually in the spring semester. Prerequisite: EDUC 330.
name: Teaching Music-Elementary Schools
notes: Open to juniors and seniors only.
10-hour field experience required (M-F during the school day).
title: Teaching of Music in the Elementary School
